20110112070113.000|20110112070115.000|CC1|DOZENS OF INVESTIGATORS HAVE    
20110112070115.000|20110112070118.000|CC1|CONVERGED FROM THE L.A.         
20110112070118.000|20110112070120.000|CC1|SHERIFF'S DEPARTMENT.           
20110112070120.000|20110112070123.000|CC1|TWO OF THEIR COLLEAGUES WERE    
20110112070123.000|20110112070126.000|CC1|FIRED ON BY A GANG MEMBER.      
20110112070126.000|20110112070129.000|CC1|THIS INCIDENT BEGAN AROUND 7:20 
20110112070129.000|20110112070130.000|CC1|WHEN THE SHERIFF'S TRAINING     
20110112070130.000|20110112070133.000|CC1|OFFICER AND A TRAINEE WERE OUT  
20110112070133.000|20110112070135.000|CC1|ON PATROL AND CONFRONTED A MAN  
20110112070135.000|20110112070138.000|CC1|AND A WOMAN IN A CAR IN EAST LOS
20110112070138.000|20110112070139.000|CC1|ANGELES.                        
20110112070139.000|20110112070140.000|CC1|ACCORDING TO THE SHERIFF, THE   
20110112070140.000|20110112070142.000|CC1|MAN GOT OUT OF THE CAR AND      
20110112070142.000|20110112070144.000|CC1|WRESTLED WITH THE DEPUTY TRAINEE
20110112070144.000|20110112070146.000|CC1|AND SHOT HIM IN THE FACE.       
20110112070146.000|20110112070148.000|CC1|THE TRAINEE SURVIVED WITHOUT    
20110112070148.000|20110112070153.000|CC1|MAJOR HEAD INJURIES DUE IN LARGE
20110112070153.000|20110112070155.000|CC1|PART OF ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE

20110112070157.000|20110112070159.000|CC1|>> THE TRAINING OFFICER

20110112070200.000|20110112070202.000|CC1|FRAY.

20110112070209.000|20110112070212.000|CC1|WAS FACING THE SUSPECT.
